data.text: @HermionesFury @ReopenCASchools @BerkeleyUnified Children already had very low risk of severe outcomes in the first place. This vaccine does nothing for their age group. My unvaccinated kids had cold symptoms for a few days when they had covid. Mandating a vaccine does nothing.

@HermionesFury @ReopenCASchools @BerkeleyUnified 2 of 12 were mine. Symptoms - sore wrists from video games during quarantine. Just like every other kid that has had covid. That is the point. If you do the analysis and conclude that your kids should take the jab, please do. 871 - a mandate of an ineffective product - madness!
@ReopenCASchools @BerkeleyUnified So why are we mandating this on children?

@ReopenCASchools @BerkeleyUnified How can I get this information from my school district? Can I simply send a request citing CPRA? I’m curious to know what the positivity rate was among vaccinated students.
@ReopenCASchools @BerkeleyUnified The vax was an epic fail, it’s now endemic, reopen schools.

@ReopenCASchools @BerkeleyUnified That actually makes sense - when the majority of the population is vaccinated, the majority of positives will be in vaccinated people. If the pop vax was 100% then 100% of + would be vaxxed (even if just 1). BUT - any severe outcomes? No. THAT is the point. Cases don't matter.
